divs: Sighting DetailsIt was about 10:15pm Oct.16th.we were playing cards with our neighbors. when they left the house, my neighbor saw a Royal blue light flashing. and yelled to come out and see the flashing blue light.We used the cell phones to record and also two digital cameras that recorded the object. We continued to monitor the object and at times you can clearly see three lights that form a triangle and then it would move in erratic motion the light would dim then it would get brighter appearing as a circle. I thought it was a helicopter at first, but it was to high in the sky and moving to fast in different directions.it was a vivid Royal blue color. We lost the object in the clouds.
